page.title: 04Grimsby Swimming Pool.
page.content: The{Grimsby Swimming Pool}is in {Scartho Road, Grimsby.}It was opened in{1962.}It is now used by approximately{500 000}people each year. The pool itself is{110 feet long by{42 feet wide.}The depth of the water ranges from{3 feet}to{6 feet 6 {inches.}There are{two shallow ends}to the swimming pool, one at each end. The{deep section}of the pool is in the centre.There is a centrally offset {diving bay}12 feet 6 inches deep, providing{one}and{three metre high {spring boards,}and a{five metre}high {firm diving board.}The large seating gallery provides accommodation for{618 spectators.{The Remedial Suite}at the Grimsby Swimming Pool incorporates a {Russian Steam Bath,}two{Finnish Sauna {Baths,}and two{Sun Beds.}This suite has proved very popular.
